mapper.select: SELECT r.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo , r.TITLE , r.CONTENT , u.NICKNAME AS nickName , r.CREATE_DATE AS createDate , r.COUNT FROM CP_REVIEW r JOIN CP_USER u ON u.USER_NO = r.USER_NO JOIN CP_POINT p ON p.USER_NO = r.USER_NO WHERE r.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY r.REVIEW_NO DESC , p.POINT DESC , p.USER_LEVEL DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CP_REVIEW SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: SELECT r.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo , r.TITLE , r.CONTENT , u.NICKNAME AS nickName , r.CREATE_DATE AS createDate , r.COUNT , f.FILE_URL AS fileUrl , p.POINT , p.USER_LEVEL AS userLevel FROM CP_REVIEW r JOIN CP_USER u ON u.USER_NO = r.USER_NO JOIN CP_POINT p ON p.USER_NO = r.USER_NO JOIN CP_RV_FILE f ON f.REVIEW_NO = r.REVIEW_NO WHERE r.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND r.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
SELECT USER_NO AS userNo FROM CP_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CP_REVIEW SET IS_ACTIVE = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_URL AS fileUrl FROM CP_RV_FILE WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
